attributes.action: Make Northampton Council keep the Northampton Balloon Festival going.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Northampton Borough Council are trying to cancel the Northampton Town Balloon Festival which has been going since 1990.
It is now tradition in the county to have the balloon festival to which hundreds of thousands of people attend. 
People of all ages, religion and gender can have a fun weekend in a safe environment which Northampton people are proud of.
Do Not get rid of it like everything else.
